Class PackageValidator.ValidationError

java.lang.Object
info.oais.oaisif.packagevalidator.PackageValidator.ValidationError
Enclosing class:
PackageValidator
static class PackageValidator.ValidationError extends Object
Class representing a validation error. The class has fields for the path to the error, the error message, the JSON fragment that caused the error, and a detail message. The class has a constructor that takes the path, message, JSON fragment, and detail message as arguments. The class has getter methods for the path, message, JSON fragment, and detail message. The class has a toString method that returns a string representation of the error. The class has a toStringBrief method that returns a brief string representation of the error. The toStringBrief method truncates the JSON fragment to a maximum of 80 characters.
